titles.title: FTC REPORTS Act
To amend the Federal Trade Commission Act to require an annual plan and a report on elder fraud, and for other purposes.
FTC REPORTS Act
FTC Robust Elderly Protections and Organizational Requirements to Track Scams Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Consumer Protection and Commerce.

bill.summary:
FTC Robust Elderly Protections and Organizational Requirements to Track Scams Act or the FTC REPORTS Act
This bill requires the Federal Trade Commission to annually (1) publish its planned policy priorities, and (2) report on its enforcement actions involving fraud targeting older adults.
